I like movies that make me feel something, whether it's happy, sad, scared, or anything in between.

content.text: What's your favorite kind of movie?
I love movies that make me feel something, whether it's happy, sad, scared, or anything in between.
Same here! I just watched a really good movie called "The Pursuit of Happyness". It was really sad, but it was also really inspiring.
I've heard good things about that movie! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a really good story.
What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like all kinds of movies, but I especially like movies that make me think. I also like movies that are funny or romantic.
I like funny movies too! I love to laugh.
Me too! What's your favorite funny movie?
I love "The Hangover" movies! They're so funny.
Those are great movies! I love them too.
I love "The Notebook"! It's such a classic.
That's a great movie! I love that one too.
I love movies that make me feel something
